h3.span:
Students will grow as problem solvers to reach their
potential in academics, arts and co-curriculars.

div.p:
N9085 North Coop Road
Appleton, WI 54915

N9085 North Coop Road
Appleton, WI 54915

Dedicated to student success, the Kimberly Area School District is a progressive public school district located in an area known as the Heart of the Valley in the Fox Cities metropolitan region in Wisconsin. We strive to ensure that every student is given the opportunity to reach their potential through academics, the arts and co-curricular activities. The district currently serves over 5,000 students in one 4K center, four elementary schools (5K-4), two intermediate schools (5-6), one middle school (7-8), and one high school (9-12).
© 2020 Kimberly Area School District. All rights reserved.
Some files may require Adobe Reader. Having difficulty finding or accessing information on this site? Contact the webmaster at (920) 788-7900.

p.em: Pupil Nondiscrimination Statement: The Kimberly Area School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, pregnancy, marital status, parental status, sexual orientation, sex, (including transgender status, change of sex or gender identity), or physical, mental, emotional, or learning disability ("Protected Classes") in any of its student programs and activities.
